channel.title: Ukraine on Satadru Mallick
channel.description: Recent content in Ukraine on Satadru Mallick

item.title: Time To Ditch The .ru Domain
item.description: Time to say good bye to satad.ru! Why a .ru domain? The first question is why I was using a .ru domain to begin with? Why not a more recognizable tld like .com, .in or .net? Was I not aware of the bad reputation of .ru being heavily used for scams and spams? The answer is YES! I knew it was a bad idea. I knew I will need to switch to some reputable TLDs sooner or later.
